QuestData.Title: Swoop Hunting
QuestData.Description: The swoop is a cunning bird, and difficult to find and hunt. A collection of Swoop Quills is a badge of cleverness and determination for a hunter.$B$BIf you are willing to take up this task, then enter the plains and hunt the swoop.$B$BBring me their quills, and bring honor to your clan.$B$BThe swoops may be found anywhere in Mulgore, but your eyes must be sharp to spot them, and your hooves must be quick to catch them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Trophy Swoop Quills to Harken Windtotem in Bloodhoof Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found the swoops, $N. Do you have their quills?
QuestData.RewardText: I know that gathering these quills was not an easy task, $n. In doing this, you prove that you are a $c of merit. It is good to have you at Bloodhoof Village.
